name: FactorY??
description:
Factor Y?? is a Arcade-style Survival  Game! 

Survive the falling boxes, while Managing the platforms and Colecting coins. Try to beat your own highscore alone, or with friends to unlock some goodies. Avoid the Hazards and beat the monsters to keep the Factory clean. And most important... Beat your friends score.


We made this game for the #Trijam, but we keep polishing to game a full game.


#action #retro #multiplayer #couchgame #fourplayers #survival #highscore #arcade #other
